entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is introduced as a character who has stopped a herd of centaurs from attacking someone. He is described as gruff and able to force his way through low-hanging branches.

entities.name: firenze
entities.description: Firenze is mentioned by Hagrid as the one who sent him warning messages before the incident with the centaurs. He is described as having forgotten something important.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is introduced as a character who is amazed and impressed by Hagrid's actions. He asks questions to understand what happened.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as a character who looks at Harry in surprise when Hagrid makes a comment about Firenze.

entities.name: centaurs
entities.description: The centaurs are mentioned by Hagrid as being upset with him and having influence in the forest. They are described as clever creatures.

relationships.description: Hagrid mentions that the centaurs have a lot of influence in the forest and could complicate the problem.
Firenze is mentioned by Hagrid as having sent him warning messages before the incident with the centaurs.
